message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to you, just like it does to us. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we propose an offer of $1,200,000 for the product. We believe this price reflects its true value while allowing for a fair transaction. Should you have any questions or require additional information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.
